This is the option for Create a new group.

https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/323bffac3c6052cd11d1275b0290f07c9f906c55/src/app/(main)/chat/%40session/features/SessionListContent/List/Item/Actions.tsx#L40

https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/src/app/(main)/chat/%40session/features/SessionListContent/Modals/CreateGroupModal.tsx#L14

[Assistant meta in settings]

This is assistant meta information you will find when you click on settings insied a modal
